comment: I send 0.0000546 BTC to 1271aKQNsbmHckc2aKpzFCzuB3VL8gnJBW, the transaction is successful recorded in blockchain, but it show "existence of this is not proven yet"  is it only detect proven from 1satoshi transaction?   ps:I am using bitcoin wallet 4.34, it is not allow too small amount transaction

thanks forr the info - any amount should work -the problem seems to be at blockexplorer - UPDATE: more info here: https://github.com/lirazsiri/blockexplorer/issues/10 - not yet found a public bitcoin api that supports last seen

title: Thanks! Wanted this app for a while.
comment: A nice feature would be if I could upload other files such as audio recordings. Good way to monetize this app is to offer a backup service of the images for BTC in case the phone gets lost, etc.  They already have their wallet out, would be easy to charge like $0.10 per backup.

Thanks for the feedback! You can already do other file-types - though it is not as obvious and easy as with pictures. You can just share any file with this app - e.g. an audio file and do it this way.
